Package me.agno.gridjavacore.filtering

Class DefaultColumnFilter<T,TData>

java.lang.Object
me.agno.gridjavacore.filtering.DefaultColumnFilter<T,TData>
All Implemented Interfaces:
IColumnFilter<T>
public class DefaultColumnFilter<T,TData> extends Object implements IColumnFilter<T>
DefaultColumnFilter is a class that implements the IColumnFilter interface. It provides methods to apply filters on column values based on the given filter conditions.

    Creates a DefaultColumnFilter object with the given expression and targetType.

      expression - the expression used for filtering the column
      targetType - the class representing the target type of the column

      Applies a filter to the given criteria query based on the provided criteria builder, criteria query, root, query specification and column filter values.
      Specified by:
      applyFilter in interface IColumnFilter<T>
      Parameters:
      cb - the criteria builder
      cq - the criteria query
      root - the root entity
      source - the query specification
      values - the column filter values
      Returns:
      the predicate representing the applied filter
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the column filter values are null or all values are null
